name: Haunted Vessels
description: A hostile Breen fleet has started attacking Starfleet ships! Stranger still, there is no sign of life aboard these ships. The Breen in the present are claiming ignorance, and the truth of these ghost ships might be stranger than fiction....
rules:
— In a Skirmish Event, you will engage in space battles against thematically appropriate foes until the Event's conclusion.
— There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
— Unique Ship Battle Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
— Using any version of G. La Forge, Dukat, Craft, Weyoun or other matching Battle Traits, will provide a bonus.
- Using either the Breen Command Warship, Breen Warship, or Jem'Hadar Fighter will provide a bonus to hull.
— Every Ship Battle you win earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
— In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: G. La Forge, Dukat, Craft, or Weyoun

featured_crew.name: Weyoun
featured_crew.flavor: A Vorta clone who oversaw a Jem'Hadar attack ship. Later killed after eradicating a Jem'Hadar rebellion.

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

next_threshold_rewards.name: Credits
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

screens.text: "Captain, we're under attack by a fleet of Breen ships. They just dropped out of warp and started firing. We've been trying to hail them, to figure out why they're firing on us, but there's no response. There's no one—not a single lifesign detected on board."

"I don't know if this is some form of cloaking the Breen have implemented or what. We've reached out to the few Breen hanging out in the Alpha Quadrant, but they all assert they have no idea what's going on."

"I can interface with the ships virtually, but not while they're attacking my location. I'll need your help distracting the ships, at least long enough for me to get in there and get a good look around."
